body.codeblock: DROP TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE [ IF EXISTS ] name [ CASCADE | RESTRICT ]

section.title: Description
section.p: DROP TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE drops an existing text search template. You must be a superuser to use this command.
You must be a superuser to use ALTER TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE.

plentry.pd: Do not throw an error if the text search template does not exist. A notice is issued in this case.
The name (optionally schema-qualified) of an existing text search template.
Automatically drop objects that depend on the text search template.
Refuse to drop the text search template if any objects depend on it. This is the default.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: There is no DROP TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE statement in the SQL standard.
